content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Use-case: Converts iron ore (with coal) into additional iron plates to support advanced production (e.g. Lab crafting).
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Use-case: Processes copper ore (with coal) into copper plates to alleviate resource shortages needed for further crafting.
Consists of:
– Copper Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Incorrect Parameter Usage for get_entities:
 – When calling get_entities, avoid unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and ensure that the correct number and type of parameters are provided.

• Lab Placement Without Inventory Verification:
 – Before attempting to place a Lab at a specific position, verify that a Lab is available in the inventory to avoid placement failures.

• Iteration on None:
 – Check that the result returned from entity retrieval functions is not None before iterating over it.

• Lab Crafting Resource Shortages:
 – Ensure that the complete chain of sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, copper-cable) is available or producible before attempting Lab crafting to prevent missing ingredient errors.
